document_data.mainbody:
he Dolphin was the flagship of Lady Ryllae Windwalker, commander of Evermeets navy.
The ship had bright white sails bearing the sigil of Queen Amlaruil Moonflower.
The Dolphin sailed widely across the Trackless Sea, patrolling the waters around Evermeet alongside swanships ships from the navy. Ryllae Windwalker took the vessel out further on occasion, going past the Wave Rocks and even within sight of Moray or Gwynneth in the Moonshaes, where its sighting was considered a good omen.
